data.title: When Jaya Bachchan addressed husband Amitabh Bachchan's love affair rumours with Rekha: 'My life would have been hell if...'
data.meta_description: In a vintage interview, Jaya Bachchan opened up about her emotions and addressed the persistent rumors swirling around her husband, Amitabh Bachchan's alleged involvement with Rekha during the late '70s. It's widely reported that these rumors took a toll on Jaya Bachchan, leading to a strained period in their marriage. There were even claims that Jaya had purportedly prohibited Amitabh from collaborating with Rekha, possibly in response to the turmoil caused by the speculations. During her interview with People's Magazine, Jaya Bachchan candidly confronted the affair rumors involving Amitabh Bachchan. She remarked, "If there was any, he would have been somewhere else, na? People liked them as a couple on-screen, and that's fine. The media tried linking him with every one of his heroines. My life would have been hell if I had taken it all seriously. We are made of sterner stuff." Despite Jaya ji's assertions, the persistent gossip surrounding Amitabh and Rekha's alleged romantic entanglement continues unabated.
data.text:
Shreyas Talpade Slams Death Hoax, Highlights Negative Effects on His Daughter

Shreyas Talpade has countered a death hoax with a strong rebuttal after a false report claiming his death went viral. Responding swiftly, Talpade confirmed that he is "alive, happy, and healthy." He expressed disappointment in the viral false news, emphasizing the harm caused by "misused humor" and highlighted its negative impact on his young daughter, who is already anxious about his well-being. Talpade requested that people stop spreading hurtful content and urged everyone to pause and consider the impact of their actions. He stressed the importance of sensitivity and discouraged seeking engagement at the expense of others' feelings. Additionally, Shreyas Talpade will soon appear in the political drama 'Emergency' alongside Kangana Ranaut, Mahima Chaudhry, Anupam Kher, and others, set to hit theaters on September 6.

19 views | 3 hours ago

Genelia D'Souza, Rimi Sen & Other Bollywood Celebs Demands Death Penalty for Accused in Kolkata Doctor Murder and Rape Case

The gangrape and murder of a trainee doctor has sparked widespread public outrage. In response, a 25-member CBI team has begun investigating the case. Citizens across the country are flooding social media with angry posts, while many actors have also voiced their outrage over the brutal incident. Hrithik Roshan, Priyanka Chopra, and Genelia D'Souza have all expressed their deep anger on social media, with Genelia advocating for capital punishment for those responsible. Rimi Sen has also expressed shock and anger, demanding the death penalty. Twinkle Khanna shared a heart-wrenching picture on Instagram to show her support. Meanwhile, the police have taken 19 people into custody in connection with the vandalism at RG Kar Hospital, and the prime suspect, Sanjay Roy, was apprehended by Kolkata police.

513 views | 3 days ago

Natasa Stankovic’s Recent Instagram Posts Raise Questions About Her Separation from Hardik Pandya

Recently, Natasa Stankovic liked several posts about toxic relationships and cheating, which caught the attention of a Reddit user who shared screenshots of these interactions. This led to speculation among netizens regarding the reasons behind her separation from Hardik Pandya. As the Reddit post went viral, many began to speculate that Hardik may have cheated on Natasa. Currently, Natasa is spending time with her son, Agastya, in Serbia, where she has been sharing both joyful posts and cryptic messages on Instagram. Her latest post focused on surrendering "worries and concerns" to God. Natasa and Hardik, who married in 2020 and welcomed their son in 2021, announced their separation in July 2024. The reasons for their split have not yet been disclosed.

2785 views | 6 days ago

All About Alicia Kaur: The Model Alongside Sidharth Malhotra in the Trending Video

Sidharth Malhotra recently captured significant attention with his bold runway appearance for Shantanu and Nikhil in Delhi. His chemistry with fellow model Alicia Kaur created a buzz online, as they were seen striking intense poses together on the ramp. Videos of their runway moments quickly went viral, generating widespread discussion. Following the event, Alicia Kaur addressed the controversy by posting an apology on her social media. She shared videos from the runway on Instagram Stories and wrote, "Sorry Kiara... It’s our job." For those curious about Alicia Kaur, here’s everything we know about the stunning model.
